message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $16,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $16,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $18,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still not able to meet at $18,000. I would like to offer $17,000 for the product.
